title: libapache2modjk
extract: A Tomcat worker is a Tomcat instance that is waiting to execute servlets or any other content on behalf of some web server. ... We want to provide load balancing, meaning run multiple Tomcat workers each on a machine of its own and distribute the requests between them.
extract_html: A Tomcat worker is a Tomcat instance that is waiting to execute servlets or any other content on behalf of some web server. ... We want to provide load balancing, meaning run multiple Tomcat workers each on a machine of its own and distribute the requests between them.
